retrofit2.http

Annotation Type HTTP


  • @Documented
 @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface HTTP
    Use a custom HTTP verb for a request. 
    
 interface Service {
   @HTTP(method = "CUSTOM", path = "custom/endpoint/")
   Call<ResponseBody> customEndpoint();
 }
    This annotation can also used for sending DELETE with a request body: 
    
 interface Service {
   @HTTP(method = "DELETE", path = "remove/", hasBody = true)
   Call<ResponseBody> deleteObject(@Body RequestBody object);
 }

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String method 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean hasBody 
      java.lang.String path
      A relative or absolute path, or full URL of the endpoint.

    • Element Detail

      • method

        public abstract java.lang.String method

      • path

        public abstract java.lang.String path
        A relative or absolute path, or full URL of the endpoint. This value is optional if the first parameter of the method is annotated with @Url.

        See base URL for details of how this is resolved against a base URL to create the full endpoint URL.

        Default:
        ""

      • hasBody

        public abstract boolean hasBody
        Default:
        false
